description: This table contains immunosuppression information reported to the United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) for each registry record or form. Information from this table can be linked to the PATIENT table by joining  with the UNOS_INFO table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: UNOS_DRUG_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The immunosuppression drug code.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Sandimmune


Neoral


Prograf (tacrolimus)


Rapamune (sirolimus)


Leflunomide (LFL)


Imuran (azathioprine, AZA)


CellCept (MMF)


Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide)


Methotrexate (Folex PFS, Mexate-AQ, Rheumatrex)


Atgam


NRATG / NRATS


OKT3 (Orthoclone, Muromonab)


T10B9 (Medimmune)


Thymoglobulin


Zenapax - Daclizumab


Simulect (basiliximab)


Gengraf


Zortress (everolimus)


EON (Generic Cyclosporine)


Myfortic (mycophenolic acid)


Generic Cyclosporine


Steroids (prednisone, methylprednisolone, Solumedrol, Medrol)


Campath (alemtuzumab)


FTY 720


Rituxan (rituximab)


Astagraf XL (extended release tacrolimus)


Generic Tacrolimus (generic Prograf)


Generic MMF (generic CellCept)


Nulojix (belatacept)


Generic Myfortic (generic mycophenolic acid)


Generic Sirolimus


Envarsus XR (tacrolimus XR)


Other Immunosuppressive Medication


Other Investigational Immunosuppressive Medication


ALG


Cyclosporin


OKT4

columns.name: IMM_PREV_MAINT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the drug was used previously for maintenance.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: IMM_CUR_MAINT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the drug is currently being used in the follow-up period for maintenance.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IMM_PREV_MAINT_YN

columns.name: IMM_ANTI_REJECT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the drug was used as an anti-rejection agent.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IMM_PREV_MAINT_YN

columns.name: IMM_DRUG_CODE_OTHER
columns.description: The drug code's description, if it is not one of the available options in column UNOS_DRUG_CODE_C.

columns.name: UNOS_IMM_INDU_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this drug was used for induction.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IMM_PREV_MAINT_YN

columns.name: UNOS_IMM_INDU_DAYS
columns.description: The total number of days this drug was administered for induction if this drug was used for induction.

columns.name: UNOS_IMM_INDU_ST_C_NAME
columns.description:
If this drug was used for induction, and the number of days used for induction is not available, this indicates why.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


N/A


Not Done


Missing


Unknown
